meanings.definition: Capable of being shaped or molded.
meanings.sent1: The clay was shapable, allowing the artist to create beautiful sculptures.
meanings.sent2: The playdough is shapable, so children can make different shapes and figures.
meanings.sent3: The shapable cookie dough made it easy for the baker to create fun shapes for the party.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was as shapable as clay, ready to be molded by new experiences.
meanings.sent5: The shapable material could be transformed into anything the designer envisioned.

meanings.definition: Able to be formed or changed in shape.
meanings.sent1: The flexible wire was shapable, allowing it to bend easily into different forms.
meanings.sent2: The balloon animals were shapable, delighting the children at the party.
meanings.sent3: The shapable rubber band amused the students as it contorted into various shapes.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were as shapable as clay, adapting to new information and perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The shapable material could be molded into intricate designs with ease.
